import{useState,useEffect}from'react';const useFetch=url=>{const[data,setData]=useState(null);const[isPending,setIsPending]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const abortCont=new AbortController();setTimeout(()=>{fetch(url,{signal:abortCont.signal}).then(res=>{if(!res.ok){// error coming back from server
throw Error('could not fetch the data for that resource');}return res.json();}).then(data=>{setIsPending(false);setData(data);setError(null);}).catch(err=>{if(err.name==='AbortError'){console.log('fetch aborted');}else{// auto catches network / connection error
setIsPending(false);setError(err.message);}});},1000);// abort the fetch
return()=>abortCont.abort();},[url]);return{data,isPending,error};};export default useFetch;
